## generateNotes() function

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
>

Generates release notes with API change details.

This hook appends API change information to the release notes generated by other plugins.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function generateNotes(pluginConfig: PluginConfig, context: SemanticReleaseContext): string;
```

**Returns:**

string
